body.p: Your Petitioner W. B Johnson says that he was fined $75. the present augst Term of the Laurel Circuit Court for failing as a Tavern Keeper to put up in his tavern a list of the Tavern rates,

He says he had no defense agst said charge, as he had no excuse except that of ignorance, he confesses that he did not know it was his duty, and therefore he failed, he did not fail out of any intention or disposition to violate the law, He thinks the penalty is a very severe one, and as it has learned him the law, he will hereafter comply with it. and he therefor prays your Excellency to remit said fine
Sworn to before me by W B Johnson this 20 day of Augst 1864.
We believe the statemts in the foregoing petition, and that the fine ought to be remitted.

W. H Randall
C B Faris
Dear sir I believe this fine ought to be remited I hope that you will do so

Laurel Cir Ct
vs
W. B. Johnson

$75.
